title: OtterAI Transcribe Voice Notes
description:
Never take team meeting or lecture notes again. Get an AI meeting assistant that records audio, takes notes, voice memos, automatically captures slides, and transcribes voice summaries. Show live caption in real time. Great for in-person recordings and online meetings. Also available on the web. English, Spanish, French only.

Condense a 1 hour meeting into 30 seconds. Otter transcribes all your meetings, interviews, lectures, and everyday voice conversations in real time. Get automated notes for in-person, Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams. 

KEY FEATURES
‚òÖ AI chat: get answers, write emails
‚òÖ AI meeting note taker & real-time AI transcription
‚òÖ Audio recorder 
‚òÖ Transcribe notes live
‚òÖ Automated meeting note taker, voice memos & summarizer
‚òÖ AI Channels: Instant chat on various channels
‚òÖ Share & collaborate 
‚òÖ All notes are searchable & shareable 
‚òÖ Edit & highlight
‚òÖ Organize & export
‚òÖ Import & sync

Many Uses
‚òÖ Save time - automatic note taking
‚òÖ Keep team in sync - share notes and action items 
‚òÖ Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, podcasts, videos, webinars, keynotes
‚òÖ Provide live captioning to anyone with accessibility needs

Record & Transcribe Live
‚òÖ Record instantly in one tap, with widget and shortcut 
‚òÖ Transcribe in real time (when online) with high accuracy
‚òÖ Automatic note taking
‚òÖ Highlight the key points to review later
‚òÖ Insert photos of whiteboard discussions, slides, etc.
‚òÖ Scroll back to grab a quote or revisit a point
‚òÖ Input audio via built-in mic or Bluetooth device

Enrich Notes with AI
‚òÖ AI meeting note taker 
‚òÖ Punctuate, capitalize, and break paragraphs automatically
‚òÖ Identify speakers (after some training)
‚òÖ Automated Slide Capture during virtual team meetings
‚òÖ Automated Summarizer after all team meetings

Share & Collaborate
‚òÖ Start a meeting recording inside a group to share the transcript live
‚òÖ Invite workplace team members to view, edit, and highlight collaboratively. All highlights are captured in the Takeaways panel.
‚òÖ Within the Takeaways panel, add comments & assign action items.
‚òÖ Share externally via links

Search & Playback
‚òÖ Search the text so you don't have to scrub through the whole audio
‚òÖ Playback at adjustable speeds
‚òÖ Follow along the highlighted word as the audio is playing
‚òÖ Tap on any word to jump the audio to that spot

Edit & Highlight
‚òÖ Edit the text to correct any errors
‚òÖ Tag the speakers to label the paragraphs and train Otter to identify meeting speakers 
‚òÖ Highlight sentences in one tap

Organize & Export
‚òÖ Organize your conversations and notes into personal folders
‚òÖ Copy to clipboard, or share directly into other apps
‚òÖ Export text as PDF, TXT, or SRT
‚òÖ Export audio as MP3

Import & Sync
‚òÖ Import audio (aac, m4a, mp3, wav, wma) and video (avi, mov, mp4, mpg, wmv)
‚òÖ Upload from Call Recorder - ACR or other call recording apps
‚òÖ Sync with your calendars to get reminders to record your teams meeting and auto-title your notes
‚òÖ Import your contacts so it's easier to share
‚òÖ Automatically back up your data to Otter‚Äôs cloud & access securely from any device

Otter Pro
‚òÖ Bulk export
‚òÖ More playback speeds and skip silence

Requirements
‚Äª Android 6.0 & up
‚Äª Internet connection for transcribing
‚Äª Account creation. See our Terms of Service: otter.ai/terms-of-service

We take security and privacy very seriously. Your data is confidential with Otter. We do not sell or share your data with 3rd parties. You have full control to delete your data permanently. Learn more at https://otter.ai/privacy

Contact Us
‚ñ∂ Support: https://help.otter.ai
‚ñ∂ Facebook: @OtterAI
‚ñ∂ LinkedIn: Otter.ai
‚ñ∂ X (Twitter): @otter_ai
‚ñ∂ Web: otter.ai

title: Turbo AI - Notetaker
description:
Turbolearn AI is now Turbo AI! We've rebranded and upgraded our AI-powered platform to transform audio, video, and text into exceptional study materials‚Äîgenerating high-quality notes, quizzes, flashcards, and podcasts instantly.

Turbo's advanced AI creates engaging notes featuring tables, emojis, diagrams, and equations, all synced seamlessly across our app and website (http://www.turbo.ai). Enhance your learning experience by chatting directly with your notes to extract deeper insights.

Students and professionals alike use Turbo AI for lecture notes, meeting summaries, journaling, and more.

Key Features:
- Rich Notes: Beautifully formatted notes with diagrams, equations, tables, and emojis.
- Quiz Questions: Instantly create amazing quiz questions from your notes.
- Flashcards: Effortlessly generate effective flashcards for quick review.
- Podcasts: Turn lengthy content into engaging, easy-to-follow podcasts.
- Folders: Easily organize notes into customizable folders for better management.
- Real-Time Sync: Sync notes across devices with instant updates.

Turbo AI is the better alternative to Coconote, Wave AI, Mindgrasp, and Study Fetch. 

Questions or ideas? Reach out to us at contact@turbolearn.ai :)

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: Smart Noter - AI Note Taker
description:
Never Miss a Word: The AI Note Taker That Records Anything You Want.

Stop typing and start engaging with Smart Noter, the ultimate AI meeting recorder and speech to text converter. As an intelligent note taker, it captures every nuance of your conversations instantly. Whether you are leading a business meeting, capturing a lecture, or dictating a memo, our accurate audio to text technology ensures you never lose a thought.

Unlock the power of automated note taking. Smart Noter is not just a recording app; it is your personal meeting assistant. Seamlessly record meetings, transcribe voice or video to text, and generate summaries with a single tap.

Why Professionals Choose Smart Noter?

1. Flawless Speech to Text

Experience industry-leading accuracy. Our powerful speech recognition engine handles continuous speech with precision. Use it to transcribe audio from interviews, podcasts, or voice notes in real-time. It is the definitive transcriber for anyone who values clarity and accuracy over manual typing.

2. The Ultimate Meeting Recorder

Transform how you manage business. Smart Noter creates detailed AI meeting notes automatically. Simply record meetings, and the app will generate word-for-word transcripts and meeting minutes. It acts as a dedicated note taker, allowing you to focus on the dialogue while we handle the documentation.

3. Professional Dictation Tool

Your voice is your fastest tool. Use Smart Noter for seamless dictation of emails, reports, and ideas. Unlike standard voice recorders, we convert your speech patterns into editable text immediately. It is perfect for lawyers, doctors, and executives who need a reliable dictation recorder on the go.

4. Live Voice Translator

Break down language barriers. Our advanced live translation feature allows you to record and translate speech instantly. Whether it is a multi-lingual business meeting or a global conference, use the voice translator to understand and document foreign languages in real-time.

5. Summarize Audio & Video

Stop listening to hours of recordings. Our AI summarizer analyzes your speech transcripts to extract key points and action items. Whether you need to summarize video content or long audio files, Smart Noter provides concise overviews, saving you hours of review time.

6. Import & Transcribe Files

Already have a recording? Easily import files to transcribe audio to text. Our audio converter supports various formats, turning your existing voice memos and recordings into searchable, editable text documents in seconds.

7. Organize & Export

Keep your voice notes organized. Smart Noter is a powerful note organizer that categorizes your recordings. Export your transcribed speech as PDF, TXT, or SRF files. Share meeting notes directly to colleagues or sync them with your favorite productivity tools.

Smart Noter is perfect for:

  • Business Professionals: Generate meeting minutes, record speech, and organize sales calls with AI meeting notes.
  • Journalists: An essential interview recorder that provides instant speech to text for articles.
  • Students: Record lectures and summarize audio for efficient study guides.
  • Legal & Medical: A secure dictation tool for drafting letters and patient notes via speech.
  • Content Creators: Transcribe video to text for subtitles and content repurposing.

Download Smart Noter today. Stop typing. Start doing.

Terms & Conditions: https://static.smartnoter.ai/terms.html Privacy Policy: https://static.smartnoter.ai/privacy.html

title: Google NotebookLM
description:
Turn complexity into clarity with NotebookLM, your brain‚Äôs new best friend. Join the millions of students, creators, researchers, professionals, CEOs, and more who are saving time, getting stuff done, and learning in new ways.

‚ÄúNotebookLM Blew Our Mind‚Äù ‚Äì Hard Fork
‚ÄúOne of the most compelling and completely flabbergasting demonstrations of AI‚Äôs potential yet.‚Äù ‚Äì The Wall Street Journal

Now, with the NotebookLM app, you can create and access notebooks, ask questions whenever you think of them, and listen to your podcast-style Audio Overviews on the go with background playback and offline support.

üìö UPLOAD SOURCES
Upload all your long and complex PDFs, websites, YouTube videos, or text into a notebook.

üí¨ INSIGHTS YOU CAN TRUST
NotebookLM becomes an expert on your sources, summarizing them and making interesting connections. Then, you can ask it questions about, well, anything ‚Äî and you can trust the answers, since your sources are cited in-line.

Long blocks of text not your preferred way to learn? Transform what you uploaded into something more your speed, like a podcast-style audio discussion with two engaging AI hosts. You can even join the show to ask questions or steer the conversation in a different direction.

title: Fireflies: AI notetaker
description: Fireflies.ai helps your team transcribe, summarize, search, and analyze voice conversations. Automatically record and transcribe meetings - Transcribe meetings across several video-conferencing apps, dialers, and audio files. - Easily invite Fireflies.ai notetaker to meetings on your calendar. - Fireflies captures video + audio and generates transcripts in minutes. - Integrates with apps like Google Meet, Zoom, Teams, Webex, RingCentral, Aircall, and other platforms. Find anything with AI-powered search - Review a 1-hour meeting in 5 minutes. - With 1 click, see action items, tasks, questions, and other key metrics. - Filter and listen to key topics discussed in your meetings. Collaborate with your co-workers - Create soundbites and easily share the most memorable moments from meetings. - Use AskFred to answer questions, summarize key moments, or create content. - Send meeting notes to your favorite collaboration apps like Slack, Notion, Asana, and more. Analyze meetings using Conversation Intelligence - Track speaker talk time, sentiment, monologues, and other key metrics to coach teammates. - Identify objections, competitors, and other topics that you can customize. - Measure performance and improve your sales, recruiting, and internal processes.

title: Summary - AI Note Taker
description:
Summary AI makes meetings more productive by automatically recording, transcribing, and summarizing conversations. Whether it‚Äôs a business meeting, interview, classroom lecture, or podcast, Summary AI captures everything clearly so you can stay present and focus.

With one tap, the app records audio, generates accurate transcripts with speaker labels, and creates easy-to-read summaries. You can even ask questions like, ‚ÄúWhat were the key action items from the marketing strategy session?‚Äù and get instant answers, thanks to built-in AI.

Why Use Summary AI?

Take and share professional meeting notes effortlessly

Record and transcribe interviews, lectures, webinars, and podcasts

Generate captions for people with hearing impairments or quiet audio environments

Who Uses Summary AI?

Professionals: Capture meeting notes, action items, and client discussions

Students: Record and review lectures, study groups, and seminars

Journalists & Researchers: Transcribe interviews with precision

Everyone: From voice memos to webinars, it handles it all

Key Features

One-Tap Recording
Start recording instantly and stay focused. Summary AI takes care of the rest.

Unlimited Recording Time
Record as much as you need, no time limits, no interruptions.

Records in the Background or with Screen Locked
Keep recording while your phone is locked or you're using other apps. Perfect for discreet, uninterrupted sessions.

Accurate Transcription with Speaker Labels
Transcripts that make sense, clearly labeled, searchable, and easy to review.

AI-Powered Summaries & Key Points
Don‚Äôt just get a transcript, get the big picture with bullet-pointed summaries.

Smart Search & Timestamp Jumping
Type a keyword, jump straight to that moment in the recording.

Ask Questions About the Conversation
Get instant answers from the AI like ‚ÄúWho was assigned the budget review?‚Äù

Automatic Punctuation, Capitalization & Line Breaks
Clean, easy-to-read transcripts without any manual formatting.

Boost Your Productivity

Save time reviewing meetings, just skim the summary

Stay present in conversations, not distracted by note-taking

Export notes to PDF, share with teams, or save for personal reference

Never lose a detail, everything is searchable

Your recordings and notes are private, always. Summary AI prioritizes security, and your data is never shared with third parties.

title: Notion: Notes, Tasks, AI
description:
Whether you‚Äôre looking to track your personal to-do‚Äôs, write and organize class notes, or run project management with a team, Notion is the AI-powered workspace that works your way, for any need. Keep track of your personal and professional goals, take notes about what you care about, and stay organized.

"AI's everything app" ‚Äî Forbes

Notion is a productivity app where you can write, plan, and organize your notes, projects, tasks and more - all in one place. Ask Notion AI about project updates, upcoming tasks, and suggestions for a more streamlined workflow.

Simplify writing notes, project and task management, and collaboration. Whether for personal, student or professional use, Notion scales to meet your individual needs with customization tools for everyone.

FREE FOR PERSONAL USE
‚Ä¢ Create as many notes, docs, and content as you want.
‚Ä¢ Use one of thousands of templates to get started.

FREE TO TRY WITH YOUR TEAM
‚Ä¢ Millions run on Notion every day, from next-generation startups to established enterprises.
‚Ä¢ Import Google Docs, PDFs, and other content types easily to get started
‚Ä¢ Write and organize meeting notes, or transcribe with AI.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration and team work at your fingertips, in one connected workspace.
‚Ä¢ Connect tools like Figma, Slack, and GitHub to Notion.

FREE FOR STUDENTS
‚Ä¢ Your study planner, class notes, to do lists and more, your way. Loved by millions of students worldwide.
‚Ä¢ Get organized for your best school year yet with beautiful, customizable templates created by students, for students.

NOTES & DOCS
Communication is made efficient with Notion's flexible building blocks.
‚Ä¢ Create docs with beautiful templates, images, to-dos, and 50+ more content types.
‚Ä¢ Meeting notes, projects, design systems, pitch decks, and more.
‚Ä¢ Find exactly what you need using Search with powerful filters to find content across your workspace.

TASKS & PROJECTS
Catch all details big and small in any workflow.
‚Ä¢ Workflow manager: Create your own priority labels, status tags, and automations to choose the exact info you want to track.
‚Ä¢ Capture every detail in a table. Break projects into manageable tasks to get the work done.

AI
One tool that does it all - search, generate, analyze, and chat - right inside Notion.
‚Ä¢ Write better. Use Notion AI to help write and brainstorm.
‚Ä¢ Get answers. Ask Notion AI questions about all your content and get answers in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Autofill tables. Notion AI turns overwhelming data into clear, actionable information  ‚Äî automatically.

SYNCS WITH BROWSER, MAC, AND WINDOWS APPS.
‚Ä¢ Pick up on mobile where you left off on desktop.

MORE PRODUCTIVITY. FEWER TOOLS.
‚Ä¢ Track to-dos, write notes, create docs, and manage projects in one connected workspace.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices with Microsoft OneNote.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate with Microsoft OneNote today.

Homepage & Quick Capture Bar
‚Ä¢ Find all notes from your connected accounts in one place to easily create, find, & act on your notes
‚Ä¢ Now with Samsung Notes integration
‚Ä¢ Capture text, voice, ink or images to your notepad with Quick Capture
‚Ä¢ Capture notes in ink. Click the pen button & write down your thoughts

Scan Pictures & Extract Text
‚Ä¢ Notes Scanner: Scan documents, pictures, or files to extract notes
‚Ä¢ Capture images to extract text from documents, files, & more
‚Ä¢ Apply different filters to change colors, add ink, crop images & more

Audio Notes
‚Ä¢ Take accurate voice notes with voice dictation
‚Ä¢ Click the Mic button to begin recording, then click it again to end recording & save the file
‚Ä¢ Dictate notes in 27 languages (note some languages are in preview) & use Auto-Punctutation to automatically format your notes

Capture Content & Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw & clip things from the web to add to your notebook
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want

Take Notes & Achieve More
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important & custom labels
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices & lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen & lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos

Collaborate & Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, & draw attention to important points
‚Ä¢ Take notes & save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast & powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family & works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more

Write notes, save ideas & keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 9.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

title: MyScript Notes (Nebo)
description:
Create stunning notes and professional documents effortlessly by hand, brainstorm ideas on an infinite canvas, and annotate PDFs seamlessly. Powered by the world's leading AI handwriting recognition technology, MyScript Notes offers a dynamic platform where handwriting, text, drawings, diagrams, and images seamlessly coexist on an expandable canvas. Enhance your note-taking experience with intuitive pen gestures, effortlessly converting handwriting and shapes into typed text and precise forms.

MyScript Notes understands every word you write in your choice of 66 languages, and works on mobile platforms ‚Äî so you can access and search your notes from any compatible device.

Enjoy 4 powerful experiences in one app:

‚óºÔ∏é Create unlimited notebooks and fixed-size pages for your daily notes.
‚óºÔ∏é Take freeform notes on boards ‚Äî the world's most advanced endless canvas.
‚óºÔ∏é Handwrite responsive documents, adding math calculations and diagrams.
‚óºÔ∏é Import existing files as PDFs, ready to annotate.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

DIGITAL HANDWRITING
‚Ä¢ Write¬π, type or dictate in the same page, sentence or even word.
‚Ä¢ Accurately convert handwriting and math to typed text, and drawn diagrams to perfect shapes. Diagrams stay editable when pasted into PowerPoint!
‚Ä¢ Write emoji and symbols with your pen.

EDIT WITH YOUR PEN
‚Ä¢ Use intuitive gestures to edit and format content without breaking your flow.
‚Ä¢ Use the marker to highlight or color, the lasso to select, and the eraser to delete entire strokes or precisely defined content.

WRITE, TYPE AND DRAW FREELY ON A BOARD
‚Ä¢ Enjoy an infinite canvas, ideal for brainstorming, mind mapping and freeform note-taking.
‚Ä¢ Pan around and zoom in or out for a fresh perspective.
‚Ä¢ Use the lasso to select, move, copy, delete or resize content ‚Äî and to convert handwriting to typed text.

SWITCH TO A DOCUMENT FOR A RESPONSIVE EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Create and edit structured notes ‚Äî your handwriting will automatically reflow as needed.
‚Ä¢ Make edits, adjust layout, rotate your device or split your screen without worrying about readability.

ENRICH YOUR NOTES
‚Ä¢ Personalize content using a range of pen types and page backgrounds.
‚Ä¢ Add photos, sketches and smart objects like math and diagrams.
‚Ä¢ Handwrite math equations and matrices across several lines, solve simple calculations and copy math as LaTeX or image.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

MyScript Notes respects your privacy and never stores content on our servers without your explicit consent.

For help or feature requests, create a ticket at https://myscri.pt/support
Check out MyScript Notes' webpage for more information about cross-platform: https://www.myscript.com/notes

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

¬πYou can use any compatible active or passive pen, including Apple Pencil, to write in MyScript Notes. Check minimum and recommended requirements for MyScript Notes: https://myscri.pt/notes-devices
